name: protobuf-as
description: Minimalistic protobuf compiler plugin which generates self-enclosed AssemblyScript code
author: Victor Sokolov <gzigzigzeo@gmail.com>

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/c8 yarn run tsx --project tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/uvu tests test --color
scripts.debug:gen-teleport: mkdir -p tmp/assembly && protoc -I/$(go env GOPATH)/src/github.com/gravitational/teleport/api/types -I$(go env GOPATH)/src/github.com/gravitational/teleport/api/types/wrappers -I$(go env GOPATH)/src/github.com/gogo/protobuf/ -I$(go env GOPATH)/src --plugin=./bin/protoc-gen-as --as_out=tmp/assembly --as_opt targetFileName=teleport.ts:mode=multi:disablePrettier=false types.proto events/events.proto && yarn asc tmp/assembly/teleport.ts --bindings esm -o tmp/teleport.wasm -t tmp/teleport.wat
